snippet.title: Retro Arcade Adventure Remade Micro - Trailer
snippet.description:
Retro styled Hack and Slash action with a fire breathing variety of Power Ups and huge bosses. Includes two Minigames.

Retro Arcade Adventure Remade is coming out in April 2013 on PC and Xbox 360(XBLIG).

The Idea for a Micro - Trailer was totally stolen by Vlambeer( http://youtu.be/q9MKvuMh2ik )!
